document_data.name: ''Belt of Fire Giant Strength''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''belt of fire giant strength''''', also referred to as a '''''girdle of fire giant strength''''', was one of six varieties of ''[[belt of giant strength|belts of giant strength]]''. It conferred its wearer with the strength of a [[fire giant]].
document_data.Description: At least some of these belts were crafted from the beard hair of fire giants.
document_data.Powers: The belt magically granted physical strength equivalent to that of a fire giant to its attuned wearer. If the wearer already possessed or exceeded such strength, the belt had no effect.
document_data.Notable Owners:
The [[minotaur]] [[Torogar Steelfist]], who served in [[Avernus]] as [[Arkhan]]'s bodyguard, wore a ''belt of fire giant strength''.

Quite fittingly, the fire giant [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Yaga-Shura]] kept a ''girdle of fire giant strength'' in the lair beneath his [[Yaga-Shura's Keep|keep]] in the [[Marching Mountains]].
